title: Kenny G reveals he recorded Jesus is King alongside Kanye West back in February
text:
Kenny G has recorded a new track with Kanye West titled Use This Gospel on his new album Jesus Is King.

And the acclaimed saxophonist divulged how the collaboration was sparked when Kanye West hired him to perform, as a Valentine's Day surprise for the rapper's wife Kim Kardashian.

The private Valentine's performance - streamed to Instagram by Kim - saw Kenny serenade the reality star in the West's living room, surrounded by vases holding single roses.

The presentation: The private Valentine's performance - streamed to Instagram by Kim - saw Kenny serenade the reality star in the West's living room, surrounded by vases holding single roses

Speaking out: Kenny G has recorded a new track with Kanye West titled Use This Gospel on his new album Jesus Is King

He opened up to TMZ: 'After we did the Valentine's Day thing, Kanye said why don't you come over to my studio and I want to play you some of my music.

'So I went over there with him and he started playing me a few of his songs and when he started playing me this particular song I thought you know, I said to him - listen, bro, let me play my sax on this and double what you guys are doing.

'It's gonna sound really great. And so he said, "Go!" So he took a microphone out and we started recording it right there.'

Collaborator: The Forever In Love hitmaker accompanied Kanye to play Use This Gospel at the Forum on Sunday; here Kanye is seen on October 25 in New York

The Forever In Love hitmaker accompanied Kanye to play Use This Gospel at the Forum on Sunday.

He reported that Kanye did not hold a rehearsal before the show, just like when they recorded the song in the first place.

Jesus Is King was released on October 25 and features 11 tracks.

It was released through GOOD Music and Def Jam Recordings.

The finished masterpiece follows a Christian sentiment, and Kanye has described it as 'an expression of the gospel.'
description: Kenny G has recorded a new track with Kanye West titled Use This Gospel on his new album Jesus Is King.
